title: [转]Craftbukkit1.7.2-R0.3 (Bete Build #3020)下载
author: aewfw
txt_content:
本帖最后由 aewfw 于 2014-2-12 21:24 编辑 

Changes since the previous Beta Build (1.7.2-R0.2 build #2974)
自上一个版本的改进或改变
Updated version to 1.7.2-R0.3-SNAPSHOT for development towards next release.
Process block cleanup first. Fixes BUKKIT-4103
Only delay removing containers. Fixes BUKKIT-5238 
Add failing unit test for ItemMeta-repairability
Consider repair cost when checking ItemMeta emptiness. Fixes BUKKIT-5304
[Bleeding] Implement setIdleTimeout and getIdleTimeout. Addresses BUKKIT-4932.
Implement UnsafeValues for give command. Addresses BUKKIT-5286
Add StatisticManager.java for diff visibility. 
[Bleeding] Fix Achievements and Statistics API.(修复成就统计的API) Fixes BUKKIT-5305
[Bleeding] Implement methods for /achievement command. Addresses BUKKIT-4932
[Bleeding] Check that vanilla recipes actually exist. Fixes BUKKIT-5277
[Bleeding] Account for null in EntityDamageEvent handling. Fixes BUKKIT-5317
[Bleeding] Properly handle EntityBreakDoor event canceling. Fixes BUKKIT-5318
Implement API for ServerListPingEvent. Adds BUKKIT-5121, BUKKIT-2465
Fix stacking for items after setting empty meta. Fixes BUKKIT-5331
Readd connection throttle
Relocate NaN check on PacketPlayInFlying.
Add BlockPressurePlateWeighted.java for diff visibility
[Bleeding] Fire interact events for Weighted Pressure Plates. Fixes BUKKIT-5053
[Bleeding] Instantiate logger earlier in CraftServer. Fixes BUKKIT-4253.
[Bleeding] Add support for ThrownExpBottle and Fish to launchProjectile(...). Fixes BUKKIT-1536…  
[Bleeding] Re-add EntityShootBowEvent lost in e93a3eb3b4c5234e3e3936bc697d566a42d3b30e. Fixes…  
Add methods to get and set arrow knockback.(添加方法来获取和设置箭头击退效果) Adds BUKKIT-5103 
Add setCritical and isCritical methods to CraftArrow.java. Adds BUKKIT-5113
[Bleeding] Implement ProjectileSource API.(执行名为ProjectileSource的API) Addresses BUKKIT-1038, BUKKIT-1156
[Bleeding] Implement setCharged and getCharged for WitherSkull. Addresses BUKKIT-3060
[Bleeding] Directly set direction in EntityFireball.(可直接给实体火球设定方向) Fixes BUKKIT-1154
[Bleeding] Use correct yaw and pitch when spawning arrows. Fixes BUKKIT-3320
[Bleeding] Store correct block type when hitting blocks.(正确储存击打块的类型) Fixes BUKKIT-5209
Don't call duplicate interact air events. Fixes BUKKIT-5359
Allow AsynchronousExecutor.getSkipQueue() to pull tasks from the queue  Feb.
Load all already generated chunks via async chunk system  Feb.
[Bleeding] Handle players disconnecting during respawn. Fixes BUKKIT-4327
Implement SpawnReason.NETHER_PORTAL and DISPENSE_EGG. Fixes BUKKIT-3148
Update clients when ItemFrame direction is set. Fixes BUKKIT-3371
[Bleeding] Correctly enchant books. Fixes BUKKIT-5302
Implement banning API. Adds BUKKIT-3535
[Bleeding] Implement Mojang command fallback system. Adds BUKKIT-5385
Match old alias behavior when migrating.
Readd BlockPlaceEvent for half slab to full block. Fixes BUKKIT-5390
Add method to forget callbacks in AsynchronousExecutor
Handle removing entity while ticking. Fixes BUKKIT-1331
Readd diff missed in the 1.7 update.
Hide message from connection throttle on startup. Fixes BUKKIT-5403
Rename Minecraft command permission nodes to meet fallback spec.
Add PlayerSelector.java for diff visibility.
Ignore player selectors if not a Command Block.
Update/improve configuration documentation.
Check if entity is in list before decrementing. Fixes BUKKIT-5404
Updated version to 1.7.2-R0.3 in pom.xml for Beta.
点此下载水桶服务端CraftBukkit 1.7.2-R0.3 Beta Build #3020

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content: 你也不带翻译一下直接copy的.

replies.author: aewfw
replies.txt_content:
我是安德面 发表于 2014-2-12 21:08
楼主，能稍微翻译下么。
内容太多 英语水平有限 只能捡重要的翻译
